content: To determine what makes each topic distinct, you can analyze the most probable keywords for each topic and look for patterns and themes that differentiate them from each other. You can also examine the sample tweets that are assigned to each topic and see if there are any noticeable differences in the content or tone of the tweets. Additionally, you can try to identify any common words or phrases that appear frequently in one topic but not in the others, or vice versa. This can help you to better understand what distinguishes each topic and how they relate to your overall dataset.
